replies.context:
I was alive when that happened and set fixated watching the entire thing on my aunt's living room floor.

It was decades before I realized that it just couldn't have happened. 

Thousands of people working at NASA watching the same TV screens we were all watching, not knowing Kennedy had opened his mouth and promised something we couldn't produce.  

Not realizing they did all of that work so the US could say they got the jump on Russia.

To make sure it looked good, they did it a few more times.    

They made a few mistakes that can't be answered, but it looked good.

So everyone did their job, punched numbers, built a ship, shot it up in the air, landed in the ocean, and the biggest hoax in modern history took place.

We had to save face, and we were decades from being able to do what Kennedy said we would do.

Something that altered the earth as we know it.... and they erased it and taped over it, and now we don't know how to do it again.

Yeah, I know I'm going to get some hate from this, but don't bother, I'm not going to argue the point.

Just my opinion, but there are too many things that cannot be explained, and all you get from NASA is, "You don't understand how it works."

Maybe not, but I need more than that to make me understand.

Three men died because one of them was outspoken and said over and over publically that it wasn't possible to do what they were saying.


So, keep your hate and arguments, not interested in it.    I lived it.  
Have a nice day.

‚Äú So, keep your hate and arguments . . .‚Äù  Nah. I don‚Äôt think I will. 

‚ÄúYou don't understand how it works.‚Äù  Yep. At least NASA got that right.

replies.context:
You are once again reminded how dense you are to think that we have the technology to fake this. Faking this would require more advanced technology than we use to actually do it. 

The space shuttles, which also think were "faked" cannot fly on their own and could not reach the many multitudes of the speed of sound we can physically see them flying at you absolute goon.

Since you pathetically failed my earlier lessons, here's a recap for you - pay attention this time..

"Faking this would require more advanced technology than we use to actually do it. "
Oh how comical indeed! The fakery actually began in 1958 shortly after Naca (pre-curser to Nasa) and the Soviets confirmed that hypersonic re-entry is impossible to survive because you simply vaporize as do meteors. Re-entry temperatures were documented to be "hotter than the surface of the sun" and posed a major problem for engineers to successfully "land" a vehicle through what they described as a "thermal thicket". Ablation was the answer and it was 'on with the show'.. (i.e. cargo plane drops).

The Shuttle was remote controlled, launched from the Cape and landed in Baikonur. Then 're-launched' via the AN-225 (specifically designed for this), and piloted back to Edwards or the Cape at high altitude and Mach 2-3 for the sonic boom - thrusters off then 'glided' in for a landing. The trick worked like a champ..

Child, I destroyed you the last time and I destroyed you this time too :D

We could visibly see the space shuttles returning to earth and we could visibly see them at altitudes far beyond that of planes and at speeds far, far, far beyond that of any aircraft. You think we have technology to move a vehicle that cannot fly on its own to well above what any plane capable of carrying that vehicle can fly at and then accelerate it to 10+ times the speed of sound? 

That's some incredible technology we have there! :D 

As a reminder once again: we could see with our own eyes the space shuttle coming in at extreme altitude and at speeds in excess of several times the speed of sound. Unless NASA has a mass hallucinogen then you are so FOS it's coming out of your eyes.

Ha! Unless you happen to own a high-powered long-range infrared camera, you personally didn't see jack s.. The only time you could actually see the Shuttle was upon approach - and only for a very short moment due to the high sink rate.

So listen up carefully - Once the Shuttle was released from the AN 225 (or the 747), it could thrust to a very high altitude (sub-orbital) and reach super-sonic ~mach 6 (not hypersonic). Obviously, you do not know what the X-15 program was truly accomplishing, so here's a top secret hint.. the Shuttle (as well as the Buran). How do I know this? It's best not to contemplate.

As a reminder to you - No one can re-enter the atmosphere at hypersonic V because you simply burn up, period. Therefore "mass hallucinogen" is indeed an accurate statement. Enjoy..

So listen carefully one more time.

You can see the space shuttle from the ground many times higher than any plane can fly. That is a statement of fact you absolute clown. It comes in at speeds far beyond that of what any aircraft can accomplish. 

In some conditions the approach of the shuttles was visible across most of the country because the heat of reentry. 

Want to know one of the ways I know that?

Because I saw it and so did millions of other people you absolute clown!

You are again, telling us that we have the technology to do something that is beyond the technology that we would use to actually do it! :D And it's hysterical.

You listen up once more wide-eyed and then we're done..

You personally never saw the Shuttle at high altitude except for the clips that Nasa provided via their long-range infrared cameras - period. Yes, you could obviously see the Shuttle fly across the country and approach from high altitude at supersonic velocity because that it what it was designed to do. Re-entry? Never. Even Columbia disaster a was supersonic break-up.

Obviously, you are not an engineer or licensed professional of any kind, so it's time for you to 'bow out' of the debate - or - you can take the Heiwaco challenge and receive 1M EUR. (google 'heiwaco 1m challenge').

Cheers!

Oh? You mean I didn't see the entry of the space shuttle going across the sky? Because yeah, I definitely did when conditions were correct. Since it was like a shooting star you could see it across large portions of the country.

And yes clown, we most certainly have seen the shuttle coming in at higher altitudes and higher velocities than any terrestrial aircraft is capable of. 

You sitting there screaming that nobody has seen stuff with their own eyes is hysterical :D

"Since it was like a shooting star you could see it across large portions of the country."

Let me clarify what you claim to have seen.. The shuttle never reentered, it flew at high alt. at supersonic. The 'shooting star' effect was created by the contrail of the rockets - that's clearly seen in right conditions at night. In addition, the TPS system did not 'ablate' so therefore it would not develop a 'streak' of light (nor would plasma leave a 'trail').

Back to the Columbia supersonic disaster - Carefully study the vid as it was spotted before the breakup (no trail). It became a 'shooting star' afterward and was clearly moving at supersonic, not the alleged hypersonic velocity of 12,000mph at the time when it turned into a fireball.

The last shuttle 'reentry' recorded was Atlantis, and you can clearly see that it left a contrail streak by the rockets. That was all part of the show..

Again, hypersonic reentry is impossible because you vaporize. Period.
